body: If I pay $10, could I upgrade from emerald to diamond for a month? Or would I have to pay $20? I know I can get it permanently for $50, but I'm unsure about monthly subscriptions.  Also, will the subscription end at the end of this month, November 30, or one month from now, December 12?
body_tagged: If I pay $10, could I upgrade from emerald to diamond for a month? Or would I have to pay $20? I know I can get it permanently for $50, but I'm unsure about monthly subscriptions.  Also, will the subscription end at the end of this month, November 30, or one month from now, December 12?
title: Quick Rank Question

replies.body: One month from now but I don't know about the first one. If it costs 10 dollars more than you pay for emerald then yeah I would assume it does
replies.body_tagged: One month from now but I don't know about the first one. If it costs 10 dollars more than you pay for emerald then yeah I would assume it does

replies.body: Alright, thanks, but I still need an answer to the first question please c:
replies.body_tagged: Alright, thanks, but I still need an answer to the first question please c:

replies.body:
Regarding your first question, I don't think it works that way.
But if you want to permanently get the diamond rank, instead of paying $100 you only have to pay $50 because you already have the emerald rank. So you get $50 taken off your purchase.
replies.body_tagged:
Regarding your first question, I don't think it works that way.
But if you want to permanently get the diamond rank, instead of paying $100 you only have to pay $50 because you already have the emerald rank. So you get $50 taken off your purchase.

replies.body: You basically said the exact same thing I said I knew. But I still need it answered.
